text: aqsm allah taealaa binafsih alkarimat 'ana hwla' la yuminun hqyqt hataa yjelwk hkmana fima waqae baynahum min nizae fi hyatk, wythakmu 'iilaa sntk baed mmatk, thuma la yajiduu fi 'anfusihim dyqana mimaa aintahaa 'iilayh hkmk, wynqadu mae dhlk anqyadana tamaan, falhukm bima ja' bih rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam min alkitab walsanat fi kl shan min shuuwn alhayat min samim al'iiman mae alrda waltslym
